name: Orlando Ascanio

why: I wake up every day to prove that relentless learning and grit can outmatch privilege, status, or luck. I build to break generational limits—so knowledge, freedom, and opportunity aren’t luxuries, but standards. My mission: to become the best man my bloodline has ever produced, while building tools that solve real problems and empower others.
how: I learn by building. No vibe-coding—I break systems down, reflect, and refine until I own the skill. I focus on production-ready, scalable solutions, leveraging full-stack technologies and automation. My process is deliberate, high-pressure, and rooted in engineering thinking.
what: I’m a Full-Stack Developer with backend strength. I build web apps, scalable APIs, SaaS platforms, and interactive MVPs using Node.js, FastAPI, React, Next.js, Docker, CI/CD, SQL/NoSQL. I’m open to freelance projects, startup collaborations, and roles where I can solve real-world challenges.

unique_selling_proposition.collaborators: I bring fresh ideas, a growth mindset, and strong collaboration to every project. My focus is on innovation and shared success through impactful solutions.
